branchCategory.name: C96
branchCategory.description: Series C96 cylinders conform to ISO 15552.  The series is available with a single or double rod in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.name: C96S(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Double Acting, Single/Double Rod w/Air Cushion and Bumper Cushion
branchItem.description: Series C96 cylinders conform to ISO 15552. The series is available with a single or double rod in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm. The air cushion and bumper cushion combination greatly reduces noise at the end of stroke. High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life. Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod. Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.name: C96S(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Double Acting, Single/Double Rod, 125 Bore
branchItem.description: Series C96 cylinders conform to ISO 15552.  The series is available with a single or double rod in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.name: C96K(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Non-rotating Rod Type, Double Acting, Single/Double Rod
branchItem.description: Series C96K cylinders conform to ISO 15552.  The non-rotating rod version is available with a single or double rod in 5 bore sizes from ø32 to ø100mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.

branchItem.name: C96Y(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Smooth Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod
branchItem.description: Series C96 cylinders conform to ISO 15552.  The series is available with a single or double rod in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life.  Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod.  Standard strokes range from 25 to 1000mm.

branchItem.description: C(P)96 add on piston rod clevis.
